TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract SwitchTok extends dylan.NET.Tokenizer.AST.Tokens.Token

Docs.summary: Represents an on/off option of a preprocessor directive which turns on/off a code generation feature.
Docs.remarks: The OnTok and OffTok classes inherit from this one and other ones may do so in order to support partial turning on of a feature.
